text:
Urg.
`Pkg.Artififacts`  is a different module, that is also called Artifacts.

```julia> using Artifacts

julia> using Pkg

julia> Pkg.Artifacts
Pkg.Artifacts

julia> Pkg.Artifacts == Artifacts
false

julia> Pkg.Artifacts
Pkg.Artifacts```
It looks like it exports all the same things though (at a least all the ones that were exported in 1.5)
So it should work unless one was accessing methods that were not part of the public API

It looks like it exports all the same things though (at a least all the ones that were exported in 1.5)
So it should work unless one was accessing methods that were not part of the public API

text: do you have packages which provide lazy artifacts?  in the Yggdrasil ecosystem, only MKL and CUDA are lazy, as far as I know, and we have fixes for this in the pipeline
